abstract: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco CEO Diane Wilsey relinquishes title to Max Hollein; board of directors changes her position from president to chairwoman, neither removing her nor instituting term limits to curb her power.

keywords.value: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Diane (Dede) Wilsey relinquished the title of C.E.O. to the new director of the Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco but kept her place as board leader.
snippet: Diane (Dede) Wilsey relinquished the title of C.E.O. to the new director of the Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco but kept her place as board leader....

headline.main: Embattled Patron Retains Power at San Francisco Museums
headline.print_headline: San Francisco Museums Leader Hangs On After Shake-Up
